segment: I like deep cleaning and this vacuum allows that for sure
It seems a little on the heavy side but it’s alright
This vacuum works exactly like I wanted it to
Does not fit under the couch
I did not think to get a retractable cord, I wish I had
Sucked ups a cup of dirt in seconds that I robot left behind
it started to smoke a little
Luckily the sheet was very easy to remove
even the cleaning lady raves about it
She has a vacuum but only uses ours
after having to replace ours 3 times in the last 5 years
This vacuum has surpassed my expectations
This vacuum works exactly like I wanted it to
picks up dog hair, dirt, hay, etc.
Does get clogged, but easy to take apart and unclog, takes no time at all.
